p: Table 5 shows the in vitro NO scavenging activities of 25 μg/ml, 50 μg/ml, 75 μg/ml, and 100 μg/ml of IGESE in comparison with those of corresponding doses of the standard antioxidant drug (Vit. C). IGESE's NO scavenging activities of the extract were significantly ( p < 0.001, p < 0.0001) dose related and comparable to that of Vit. C at 75 μg/ml and 100 μg/ml of IGESE ( Table 5).
